title: Katie Price shares a sweet family snap after ex Charles Drury's 'cocaine romp' claims
text:
Katie Price has taken to Instagram to share a sweet snap with four of her children, following her ex Charles Drury's claims that they enjoyed a 'cocaine-fuelled romp.'

The former glamour model, 41, took to Instagram to share the snap of her family, after Charles claimed they enjoyed the romp during their first date at a hotel spa.

While many of Katie's followers took to social media to praise children Junior, 14, Princess, 12, Jett, six, and Bunny, five, several asked about the whereabouts of her oldest son Harvey, 17.

Lovely: Katie Price has taken to Instagram to share a sweet snap with four of her children (L-R), Junior, 14, Jett, six, and Bunny, five, and Princess 12, following ex Charles Drury's claims

In the snap, Katie's four children were all sporting matching black tracksuits as she sweetly praised her family, with the caption reading: 'One of my favourite photos.'

While many of Katie's followers were quick to praise her 'gorgeous' family, several asked about her son Harvey, who did not feature in the snap.

One comment said: Ahhh no Harvey does he still love the trains,' to which Katie replied: 'Absolutely loves trains! Especially Gatwick Express.'

Another comment said: 'Shame Harvey was missing from it still a lovely picture of them,' while a third said: 'Ahhh no Harvey. Does he still love the trains.'

Bizarre: While many fans praised the former glamour model's family, several commented on the whereabouts of her oldest son Harvey, 17 (pictured)

Where is he? Several of Katie's followers noted Harvey's absence in the comments section, with one also asking about his love of trains

Nice: Katie responded to the post saying that her son 'absolutely loves' trains, but did not say his whereabouts

Gushing about Katie's children another fan commented: 'I love how Bunny and Jett obviously look up to their big brother and sister so much.'

One comment also said: 'Princess is so pretty... gorgeous hair too,' while a third also wrote: 'Gorgeous kids and how amazing is princess' hair!!?' [sic]

A third follower added: 'Gorgeous children.'

Friendly: Fans also gushed about Katie's family, as they praised her 'gorgeous' children

Katie's post comes after her ex Charles' claims that they enjoyed a 'cocaine-fuelled romp' in a hotel spa during their first date.

The builder, 22, branded Katie who is in recovery, a zero-to-one out of ten in the bedroom and called her a 'lazy lover' after they had spent the evening bingeing on drinks and drugs.

He told The Sun that drugs were already there when he arrived and said when he woke up in the morning, Katie still hadn't gone to bed.

He said: 'We had a few drinks to relax and then headed up to the hotel room where we had even more and that's when things started to get intimate for the first time.'

Explosive: It comes after Katie's ex Charles, 22, claimed that he enjoyed a 'cocaine-fuelled romp' with the star in a hotel spa during their first date

Charles said he found the night 'disappointing' and an 'anti-climax'.

He said: 'I can't say zero, can I? I'd give her a one out of ten. She was a bit lazy, but then suddenly she would surprise you and jump on top.'

Charles claims Katie stayed up all night, while he slept and trashed the hotel room and said he had to 'pick up snotty tissues in the morning.'

He said: 'She was still wide awake the morning after. The hotel was a mess, so whatever she was up to in the night, I was sleeping through.'

Drama: Charles also branded Katie who is in recovery, a zero-to-one out of ten in the bedroom and called her a 'lazy lover' (pictured in a video from her YouTube channel)

He did defend her by saying is a good mother but is using drugs to cope, but claims she is 'all over the place'.

A spokesperson for Katie Price told MailOnline: 'There is no truth in the allegation that she is taking drugs every day and has made significant steps to being drug free.

'There have been lapses in the past but they are just that, not a regular event. Katie is still in recovery and making progress.'
description: The former glamour model, 41, took to Instagram to share the snap of her family, after Charles claimed they enjoyed the romp during their first date at a hotel spa.
